metadata.name: Jeyran
metadata.description:
In the palace merrymaking, the shine flowers were painted on the walls and sound of music and dancers all were ostensible.
Harem’s women had to hide love in depth of their hearts and put satisfaction mask on their faces.
As if they were standing in a line to be loved by cruel Shah!
“Jeyran” who was Shah’s sweetheart  wasn’t an exception but she was the one who owns Naser_Din Shah’s heart.
